text: " I feel , in the restructured setting , you know , it ' s much more , I wouldn ' t say easier may not be the word , but maybe less challenging because it ' s much more homogenous within that institution and you only have to work in your institution whereas we have to work across all these little and then we are spending a lot of time and cracking ourselves in bits and pieces whereas it can all be done , you know , under one , I think , more harmonization , less bickering , less fighting , and then we can get more funding . " - I18 , Human Health
